MYSTERIES UNRAVELED (BARELY)

INVENTORY LOG

LIVE

Founded in 2009 by Leo Vance, a former insurance actuary out of Columbus who spent eleven years calculating the precise dollar value of other people’s catastrophes before buying a bankrupt VHS duplication plant off eBay for reasons he still can’t fully articulate. Our meticulous process removes all context—clocks are pixelated, newspapers redacted, and any visible branding erased, ensuring each tape delivers a pristine void for $39.95 a month.

Leo does not respond to the podcaster who called his tapes “overhyped echoes of boredom.” He has, however, mailed that podcaster Tape #001 every month for three years without explanation.
